original_text: Jehoiada's son, Benaiah, was also one of David's brave soldiers. He came from Kabzeel and he did many great things. He killed two of Moab's best soldiers. He also went down into a deep hole to kill a lion when snow was on the ground.
korean_text: 또 갑스엘 용사의 손자 여호야다의 아들 브나야이니 그는 용맹스런 일을 행한 자라 일찍이 모압 아리엘의 아들 둘을 죽였고 또 눈이 올 때에 구덩이에 내려가서 사자 한 마리를 쳐죽였으며

sentences.original_text: was also one of David's brave soldiers
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗의 용맹한 용사 중 한 사람이었다

sentences.original_text: and he did many great things
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 많은 위대한 일을 했다

sentences.original_text: He killed two of Moab's best soldiers
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 모압의 최고 용사 두 명을 죽였다

sentences.original_text: He also went down into a deep hole
when snow was on the ground
